ComicInfo.Summary: Holo-ween [Part 4]: Picard, Riker, Worf, and Troi resume their roles as monsters to rescue the remaining crew members held hostage on the holodeck by Redjac, who has now simulated a holographic version of Armus to further instill fear in the Enterprise officers. Deanna works with Beverly and Scotty to come up with a way to stop Redjac once and for all.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-17 22:17:02. [CVDB1026933] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:06:07. [Issue ID 2574677]

ComicInfo.Title: Holo-ween [Part 4]
